# FIGURES

## Area 5ABCD

```{r fig-catch-5abcd, fig.cap="Catch for Area 5ABCD"}
make.catches.plot(catch.5)
```

```{r fig-base-mcmc-trace-5abcd, fig.cap="Traceplots of posterior samples for the Area 5ABCD base reference model. $\\bar{R} = R_{Avg}$, $q_1$ = Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, $q_2$ = Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, $q_3$ = Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, $q_4$ = Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and $q_5$ = Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
make.traces.plot(base.model.5abcd)
```

```{r fig-base-mcmc-priors-5abcd, fig.cap="Prior probability distributions used in the Area 5ABCD base reference model. $\\bar{R} = R_{Avg}$, $q_1$ = Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, $q_2$ = Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, $q_3$ = Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, $q_4$ = Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and $q_5$ = Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
make.priors.posts.plot(base.model.5abcd)
```

```{r fig-base-mcmc-priors-posts-5abcd, fig.cap="Histograms of posterior samples with prior probability distributions (lines) used in the Area 5ABCD base reference model. $\\bar{R} = R_{Avg}$, $q_1$ = Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, $q_2$ = Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, $q_3$ = Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, $q_4$ = Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and $q_5$ = Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
make.priors.posts.plot(base.model.5abcd, priors.only = FALSE)
```

```{r fig-base-mcmc-autocor-5abcd, fig.cap="Autocorrelation plots for the Area 5ABCD base reference model. $\\bar{R} = R_{Avg}$, $q_1$ = Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, $q_2$ = Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, $q_3$ = Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, $q_4$ = Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and $q_5$ = Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
make.autocor.plot(base.model.5abcd)
```

```{r fig-base-mcmc-pairs-5abcd, fig.cap="Pairs plots of posterior samples for the Area 5ABCD base reference model. $\\bar{R} = R_{Avg}$, $q_1$ = Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, $q_2$ = Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, $q_3$ = Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, $q_4$ = Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and $q_5$ = Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
make.pairs.plot(base.model.5abcd)
```

```{r fig-base-index-fits-5abcd, fig.cap="MPD fits to observed indices of abundance (points) for the Area 5ABCD base reference model from: (a) the Hecate Strait Assemblage survey, (b) the Queen Charlotte Sound Synoptic Survey, (c) the Hecate Strait Synoptic Survey, (d) the Commercial CPUE pre-1996, and (e) the Commercial CPUE post-1995."}
grid.newpage()
pushViewport(viewport(layout = grid.layout(2, 3)))
print(i.plot(base.model.5abcd, 1, "a"), vp = ggvp(1, 1))
print(i.plot(base.model.5abcd, 2, "b"), vp = ggvp(1, 2))
print(i.plot(base.model.5abcd, 3, "c"), vp = ggvp(1, 3))
print(i.plot(base.model.5abcd, 4, "d"), vp = ggvp(2, 1))
print(i.plot(base.model.5abcd, 5, "e"), vp = ggvp(2, 2))
```


```{r fig-base-biomass-5abcd, fig.cap="Biomass for the Reference Model, Area 5ABCD"}
b.plot(base.model.5abcd,
       base.model.5abcd.name,
       depl = FALSE,
       add.hist.ref = TRUE,
       c(1971, 1971),
       c(1986,2004))
```


```{r fig-sens1-biomass-5abcd, fig.cap="Biomass for the Sensitivity to, Area 5ABCD"}
b.plot(c(base.model.5abcd, sens.models.1), c(base.model.5abcd.name, sens.models.name.1))
```

\clearpage
